title: Introductions and Greetings
objective: Learn to introduce yourself and greet people formally and informally.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to introduce yourself and greet people formally and informally.

title: Personal Information
objective: Learn to ask for and give basic personal information such as name, age, nationality, and occupation.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to ask for and give basic personal information such as name, age, nationality, and occupation.

title: The Alphabet and Spelling
objective: Learn to recognize and pronounce the English alphabet and spell words, names, and email addresses.
examples: How do you spell your name?
My email is j-o-h-n at mail dot com.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to recognize and pronounce the english alphabet and spell words, names, and email addresses.

title: Numbers and Phone Numbers
objective: Learn to count from 1 to 100 and ask for or provide telephone numbers.
examples: Can you repeat your number, please?
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to count from 1 to 100 and ask for or provide telephone numbers.

title: Days, Months, and Dates
objective: Learn to identify days of the week, months of the year, and talk about dates and birthdays.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to identify days of the week, months of the year, and talk about dates and birthdays.

title: Telling the Time
objective: Learn to ask and tell the time using the 12-hour and 24-hour format.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to ask and tell the time using the 12-hour and 24-hour format.

title: Daily Routines
objective: Learn to describe your daily activities using the present simple tense.
examples: She goes to work at 8 a.m.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to describe your daily activities using the present simple tense.

title: Family and Relationships
objective: Learn to talk about your family members and describe relationships using basic vocabulary.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to talk about your family members and describe relationships using basic vocabulary.

title: At Home and Around the House
objective: Learn to describe home and common objects.
examples: The sofa is in the living room.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to describe home and common objects.

title: Describing People
objective: Learn to describe people’s appearance and personality using simple adjectives.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to describe people’s appearance and personality using simple adjectives.

title: Hobbies and Free Time
objective: Learn to discuss your hobbies and what you like to do in your free time using like/love + verb-ing.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to discuss your hobbies and what you like to do in your free time using like/love + verb-ing.

title: Nationalities and Countries
objective: Learn to talk about countries, languages, and nationalities.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to talk about countries, languages, and nationalities.

title: Everyday Activities
objective: Learn to talk about daily routines and common actions.
examples: I take the bus to work.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to talk about daily routines and common actions.

title: Places in Town and Directions
objective: Learn to identify common places in a town and ask for or give basic directions.
examples: The bank is next to the supermarket.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to identify common places in a town and ask for or give basic directions.

title: Food and Drink
objective: Learn to talk about food, drinks, and preferences.
examples: Do you want coffee or tea?
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to talk about food, drinks, and preferences.

title: At the Restaurant
objective: Learn to order food and drinks and understand simple menus.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to order food and drinks and understand simple menus.

title: Shopping and Prices
objective: Learn to use vocabulary related to shopping and ask for prices and sizes.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to use vocabulary related to shopping and ask for prices and sizes.

title: Weather and Seasons
objective: Learn to describe the weather using common expressions and ask about it in different contexts.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to describe the weather using common expressions and ask about it in different contexts.

title: Basic Grammar and Sentence Structure
objective: Learn to understand the use of subject pronouns, the verb ‘to be’, simple present, and word order in basic sentences.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to understand the use of subject pronouns, the verb ‘to be’, simple present, and word order in basic sentences.

title: Practical Conversations
objective: Learn to participate in simple real-life dialogues.
learningOutcome: By the end of this topic, students will be able to participate in simple real-life dialogues.
